body_html:
Even if that might work (and I have been able to run simple TensorFlow programs using Python 2.7 on Windows), I don't think we'd want to support such a configuration. Some of the issues discussed here are relevant:

http://siomsystems.com/mixing-visual-studio-versions/

body:
Even if that might work (and I have been able to run simple TensorFlow programs using Python 2.7 on Windows), I don't think we'd want to support such a configuration. Some of the issues discussed here are relevant:

http://siomsystems.com/mixing-visual-studio-versions/
